#summary Adds a CodeProvider which adds missing namespace references for extension methods.

===== Requires DXCore 10.2 since build 1728 =====

== Introduction ==

This plugin was created in response to a user request. Mark Miller [http://community.devexpress.com/blogs/markmiller/archive/2011/03/23/importing-namespace-references-for-extension-methods-in-coderush-for-visual-studio.aspx blogs about this in full here]

The plugin adds a !CodeProvider which adds missing namespace references for extension methods.

== Usage ==
Access the codeprovider through the !CodeRush\Refactor key (Defaults to Ctrl+`) and choose *Add Namespace Reference*
